meanings.sent1: The previewers gathered to watch the new movie before it was released.
meanings.sent2: The previewers were excited to get a sneak peek of the upcoming album.
meanings.sent3: The previewers joked that they were like detectives getting a first look at the case.
meanings.sent4: The previewers were like eager explorers discovering a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The previewers' job is to give their opinions before the final decision is made.

meanings.sent1: All the previewers were invited to test the new video game before it launched.
meanings.sent2: The previewers shared their thoughts on the prototype of the new product.
meanings.sent3: The previewers formed a club to be the first to see all the new exhibits at the museum.
meanings.sent4: The previewers were like eager students getting a sneak peek at the exam questions.
meanings.sent5: The previewers' feedback is crucial in shaping the final version of the project.
